Class AdminService

java.lang.Object
services.AdminService
public class AdminService extends Object
AdminService handles various administrative operations related to hospital staff, medication inventory, and appointment management.

It provides functionalities such as viewing and managing hospital staff, handling medication inventory, and managing appointments and replenish requests.

Since:
2024-11-15
Version:
1.0
Author:
CHARMAINE LIEW YINGSUI

  • Method Details

    • displayStaffList

      public void displayStaffList(Scanner scanner)
      Displays the list of hospital staff and provides filtering options.
      Parameters:
      scanner - Scanner object to read user input

    • displayCreateNewStaffInput

      public void displayCreateNewStaffInput(Scanner scanner) throws Exception
      Prompts the user for input to create a new staff member and saves it.
      Parameters:
      scanner - Scanner object to read user input
      Throws:
      Exception - if an error occurs while saving the new staff member

    • displayRemoveStaffInput

      public void displayRemoveStaffInput(Scanner scanner) throws IOException
      Allows the user to remove a staff member from the list.
      Parameters:
      scanner - Scanner object to read user input
      Throws:
      IOException - if an error occurs during staff removal

    • displayUpdateStaffInput

      public void displayUpdateStaffInput(Scanner scanner) throws IOException
      Allows the admin to update a staff details from the list.
      Parameters:
      scanner - Scanner object to read user input
      Throws:
      IOException - if an error occurs during staff removal

    • filterStaffByRole

      public List<Staff> filterStaffByRole(List<Staff> staffList, String role)
      Filters the staff list by role.
      Parameters:
      staffList - The original list of staff members
      role - The role to filter by (e.g., Doctor, Pharmacist)
      Returns:
      A list of staff filtered by role

    • filterStaffByGender

      public List<Staff> filterStaffByGender(List<Staff> staffList, String gender)
      Filters the staff list by gender.
      Parameters:
      staffList - The original list of staff members
      gender - The gender to filter by (Male, Female)
      Returns:
      A list of staff filtered by gender

    • filterStaffByAge

      public List<Staff> filterStaffByAge(List<Staff> staffList, int upper, int lower)
      Filters the staff list by age range.
      Parameters:
      staffList - The original list of staff members
      upper - The upper age limit
      lower - The lower age limit
      Returns:
      A list of staff filtered by age range

    • displayMedicalInventory

      public void displayMedicalInventory(Scanner scanner) throws IOException
      Displays a list of all medicines in the inventory, showing their name, current stock, and low stock level.
      Parameters:
      scanner - The scanner object used for user input. This parameter is not used in this method.
      Throws:
      IOException - If there is an issue retrieving the medication list from the repository.

    • displayCreateNewMedicineInput

      public void displayCreateNewMedicineInput(Scanner scanner) throws Exception
      Prompts the user to input details for a new medicine and adds it to the inventory.
      Parameters:
      scanner - The scanner object used for user input.
      Throws:
      Exception - If there is an issue during input validation or adding the new medicine.

    • displayUpdateMedicineInput

      public void displayUpdateMedicineInput(Scanner scanner) throws IOException
      Allows an admin to update the stock and low stock alert level of an existing medicine in the inventory.
      Parameters:
      scanner - The scanner object used for user input.
      Throws:
      IOException - If there is an issue retrieving or updating the medication data from the repository.

    • displayRemoveMedicineInput

      public void displayRemoveMedicineInput(Scanner scanner) throws IOException
      Prompts the admin to select and remove a medicine from the inventory.
      Parameters:
      scanner - The scanner object used for user input.
      Throws:
      IOException - If there is an issue retrieving or removing the medication data from the repository.

    • approveReplenishRequest

      public void approveReplenishRequest(Scanner scanner) throws IOException
      Approves replenish requests for medicines that have requested stock replenishment. Displays the replenish request details and prompts the user to approve a request.
      Parameters:
      scanner - The scanner object used for user input.
      Throws:
      IOException - If there is an issue retrieving the replenish request or updating the request status.

    • displayAppointmentDetails

      public void displayAppointmentDetails() throws IOException
      Displays details of all appointments, including the doctor, patient, and status, and outcome for completed appointments.
      Throws:
      IOException - If there is an issue retrieving the appointment or medical record data.
